response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us, reflecting its unique features, durability, and the expertise poured into its creation. We believe it could be a valuable asset to you, offering unparalleled benefits and convenience. Considering its worth and the potential it holds for you, we kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product for $15,000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our premium product.", "product_price": 15000}
